channel.title: Maybe we should disable animals/monsters in creative?
channel.description: Cause stuff like this happens, [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5KkAG.png[/img] Also Agl is mad cause someone made a lot of snowmen on his place.

item.title: Maybe we should disable animals/monsters in creative?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Just make it wipe them once a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Maybe we should disable animals/monsters in creative?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:434482”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=537203.msg3927741#msg3927741 date=1330386972]
I can disable animals and monsters in creative if that is what you guys want.

Alternatively, I could just clear them all once a day or something.
[/quote]

make it so people cant spam eggs[/quote]

I don’t think that is possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Maybe we should disable animals/monsters in creative?

item.description:

They’ll despawn. It is annoying in some ways, maybe have the “TNT List” be a general special permissions list?
[/quote]

this is the 10th time im telling you peaceful mobs dont despawn[/quote]
Oh. Well then burn em all!
